# Pipeline Components

```{r Pipeline Components, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
pc_keys=get_unique_keys(params$pipeline$pipeline_components)

for (pc_element in pc_keys) {

    if (pc_element == 'pipeline_components_desc') {

        cat(params$pipeline$pipeline_components$pipeline_components_desc, sep='\n')
        cat('\n')

    } else {

        new_pc_element_name = camel(pc_element)
        cat(paste('## ', new_pc_element_name, sep=''), sep = '\n')
        cat('\n')
        cat(params$pipeline$pipeline_components[[pc_element]], sep = '\n')

    }
}
```
